#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  std:ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  int t,n,m,x,y,i,j,ans;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
  { ans=0;
  	cin>>n>>m;
  	int a[n+1];
  	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
     cin>>a[i];
	for(i=0;i<m;i++)
  	{
  	  	cin>>x>>y;
  	  	if(a[x]<a[y])
  	  	ans+=a[x];
  	  	else
  	  	ans+=a[y];
  	}
  	cout<<ans<<"\n";
  }
  return 0;
}
